title: Legacy Testimony Unleashed
outcome: A forgotten protocol exposes the data-driven dossiers used to choose Council members. Personal secrets and damning evaluations leak, splintering alliances as Council members face demands for resignation, while the public questions the legitimacy of rule by algorithm and the haunted legacy of Halden's original plans.

events.description: Automated Council briefings begin to include detailed dossiers on each member, revealing algorithmic justifications for their promotion and warnings about their loyalty, risk, and past decisions.

Fragments of these dossiers leak online and to key city leaders. Citizens learn how Council seats have been filled, including private flaws, past infractions covered up, and statistical predictions on Council alignments.

Public outrage flares as details reach the streets. Protests erupt around Council offices, demanding resignations and direct elections, while embattled members accuse one another of orchestrating the leak.

A factional standoff paralyzes the Council as Directorate hardliners call for suspension of all public briefings and a forceful return to central authority, while Innovators and Harmonists split on whether to embrace or totally dismantle the system.
